item.description: plse come to our business networking meetup at the Hearth and Kettle resturant where we will investigate the value of connections in our lifes and businesses. How do we connect and what to do after we connect. There is will be dinners that you can choose off a menu at a modest price. Please come and ask question I will be speaking that night. Bring Plenty of business cards and be prepared to tell about your business and make some amazing friends.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one who is standing at the front door waiting for people
item.name: The value of connecting in our businesses
